targets.query: SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE  "device" != 'rootfs'  and fstype != 'squashfs' and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
